titleStmt.title: The art of angling wherein are discovered many rare secrets, very necessary to be knowne by all that delight in that recreation.
Barker's delight
titleStmt.author: Barker, Thomas, fl. 1651.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Barker. cf. DNB.
Also issued as part 4 of The country-mans recreation, 1654. Beginning with the edition of 1657, title became 'Barker's delight'.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
